parts.text: We live in Victoria, very close to US border, and certain parts of our area force our phones to go over to the US and so we get charged roaming.
I got charged for roaming though I never left the country
We're in strict lockdown so I can't go anywhere and you charge me for roaming. That's impossible
Why did you notify me I'm roaming and charge me when I'm in Alberta?
I'm in Canada and you are charging me for roaming
I don't know why my phone says I'm in the united states when I'm in Canada I don't want roaming charges
I was in Canada why do you charge roaming
roaming charges when in Canada
charged for US roaming by mistake
my phone keeps picking up US towers where I live I don't want to be charged roaming fees for this
I just got a notification about roaming charge. This is a mistake, please revert it, I didn't cross the us border, just drove by
why is there a US roaming charge on my bill for
the last month
? I didn't travel to the US
I see some charges for roaming on my bill, this must be an error, I am still in Canada
I can't even leave the country due to covid so how come you are charging me for roaming in the US?
why do I have roaming charge if I never left Canada
I was charged a 65 dollar US roaming fee and I've never left Canada. I was in Victoria BC which I visit frequently and have never been charged this fee.
I live in Victoria right on the US border and have been getting these charges. I was not in the US. Can you reverse the charges?
I would like a roaming charge on my cell phone reverse. I was recently in southern Saskatchewan and a charge came on that I was in the US. We are not allowed in the United states.
I live on Vancouver Island and was charged 63 dollars for roaming even though I never left Canada. I went up island for the day. I would like the charges reversed please.
I received my mobile bill and I see a charge for US roaming. I did not not leave Canada since I am not allowed to leave Canada under the COVID rules.
I noticed I was charged for one day of US roaming over Christmas when I drove through Osoyoss. I did not go to the US
we were on Vancouver Island in November and I notice that I have two days where I am charged roaming charges.
Hi, I was charged for roaming when I haven't traveled to the US for months
I was overcharged on my last bill. I was charged for easy roam in the US but I did not go to the US
I got charged for US roaming but I haven't been within 5 km of the US border.
My issue is simple: I was charged 15 dollars for Easy Roam US for 5 days, but I was never in the US. I was in Victoria, BC
I got charged 25 dollars for U.S roaming but I never went to the states, I live borderline
i have been charged 65 dollars US roaming on November 4th. I did not go to the US. I was in East Sooke , BC that day which is on the coast
Can you please remove the US easy roam charge from my account. I have not been to the states, but have been hiking near the border.
Ive noticed a couple roaming charges on my account and I havent travelled to the US since 2020.
on my march bill I was charged 55 dollars easy roam USA in error.  I live in Canada on the border
i have an easy roam charge on my bill but was not in the US.  Close to the border though
I was charged easy roam for 10 days on my telus mobility bill but I have not travelled.
There are 6 days of easy roam charges on my account - I never left my city let alone the country.  I suspect it is because of where I live
i was charged easy roam for 4 days in december, but never left the country.  i was near the border and had messages on my phone saying i was in usa, but i never left the country.
I have a US roam charge on my account. I havent been near any US border.
Im on Vancouver island and am requesting that any and ALL USA roaming charges be reversed because Im not roaming. Its been like this for months.
I live on the US Canada border and I have been charged 9 dollars 99 cent in easy roam even though I did not go to the US
I have a us roaming charge on our mobility bill but we never left canada
I got billed roaming charges on sept 5th while in Sooke, BC
I was charged for 4 days of roaming in the US when I never left the country.
I have roaming charges on my statement that came about as we live close to US border
Hello, I was charged for us roaming. I was never in the USA
My daughter is camping in BC and we've been charged roaming fees for being in the US. She is not in the US
Please remove all easy roam charges over the past year. I have not left Canada, but live near the US border.
My bill for April has some additional charges that I would like to assess. The roaming charges whould be removed as I did not travel to the US. That happens everytime I vist my friend in Victoria
we are charged for a roaming charge to the USA we have never been in the USA since Covid 19 would you please reverse the charge ASAP Thank you
I just wanted to jump on and see if there is any way we can reverse the charge for my accidental Easy Roam charge, I live in Niagara close to the border
I was charged US roaming because I live in Victoria BC, and sometimes when I drive south of the island, I get roaming charges.
We have been charged for roaming in us when we did not cross the border. I would like the charge removed
i live close to the border and was charged 4 days of easy us roam but i didnt travel to the US
I had a US roaming charge on my most recent telus bill, but I wasn't anywhere near the US. Just hoping to get that charge removed.

I have a US roaming charge on my bill for 64.64, but I was at Lake Kookanusa and didnt enter into the USA, i was just close to the border. Would it be possible to have that charge looked at and reversed?
I need an 6 dollar US daily roaming removed from my current bill please.  It ended up on there because I was at a provincial park near the US border
I have US roaming charges on my bill but I was not in the US. I was in Sooke BC from July 12th  to the 17th which is close to the border. I would like the roaming charges removed from my bill
I just have a US roaming charge on my October bill but I never went to the US
I was charged for roaming and was not in the us but close to the boarder.
i am near the border but got roaming charge notices on both our phones. I want to make sure we havent enabled roaming since we arent even in the USA nor allowed to cross the border at this time!!!
i see that i am being charged for roaming in the US, but i was not in the US
My bill shows some charges for easy roam but I did not travel to the states.
I was charged roaming yesterday  for the US and I never left Canada
I noticed a roaming charge on my last bill, which is a mistake because I was not in the US.
I have a 64 dollar roaming charge on my bill; however, I was never in the US I was on Vancouver Island.
I was charged four dollars for roaming on my cell phone when I was climbing Mount Cheam in Chilliwack, i was not in the US
On July 12 I was charged a US roaming fee for my account and i obviously I was not in the US as the border is closed
i was charged for easy roam but I did not cross international border
i got charged for us roaming. I never entered the us
I need an accidental roaming charge removed from my bill. Obviously I didnt go to the USA right now
I just have a roaming charge and I never left the country
I have a charge of 6 dollars 99 cents for roaming yet I have never left Canada.  I realize that when on the west coast sometimes roaming kicks in.
Why is there roaming charges on my last statement when I have never left the country?
I was charged 50 dollars for easy roam but I haven't left Canada.  We were down by Victoria which is close to the us border.
I have some roaming charges on my most recent cell phone bill but I have not been to the States. As you know, our border is actually closed. I'm wondering how I can have this corrected.
Accidental roaming
Accidental roaming while in Canada
charged for roaming while in canada
never was outside of the country but being charged with roaming fee.
never left the country but getting roaming fee charges.
charged easy roam but was always in Canada
i would like the roaming charges removed from my bill. As I havent been to the United States
did not cross the border
roaming notification in error
roaming charges for states when we haven't been there
roaming charges on my bill when I haven't travelled?
I never went to the united states but I see a roaming message by mistake
On Sunday I was out at Prince Edward Point, in Ontario. I got a text about entering the US and the 8 dollar fee. I just want to make sure I'm not charged anything - I was not in the US
I was just going over my recent bill I was charged 8 dollars for easy roam.  I haven't been to the United States for over 2 years.
I have an additional charge on one of our phones for data roaming, however I was not in the states or out of the country.
They moved to Vancouver and I think her phone picks up US towers
I received an email that I was in the US.  I have not been to the US.  I reside in Nakusp, BC and this past week had to go to Toronto.  I don't understand why you thought I was in the US
I got an alert saying phone outside of Canada it was not only travel from Cardston to Lethbridge on Alberta highway 5.
Phone says i am outside of canada but i am not
We got alert that one of our numbers traveling abroad, but is is not correct
EasyRoam activated but I wasn't out of province
because i gotta a text from telus saying that i'm in the usa it said welcome to the usa and i'm not even in the us
we're getting charged us rates in canada
i do not want to be charged roaming charges because i work at a hospital beside the border
i'm being charged with roaming but i'm not out of the country
i got charged roaming in the states when i wasn't in the states
